reviewText:
Questo film  fantastico! Interessante, divertente, un po tristeperfetto. Bello.
Con sottotitoli italiano e inglese, molto utile per gli studenti di tutti a due lingue.

We thought this would be a good addition to our dragon movie collection, especially after alot of them showed up as 15-20 min movies and didn't advertise that atall. This would probably be good if my 3 and 4yr olds new italian. We waited almost 2months for this to show up and to then see that there is no english option at all.
